description:
The fate of the World Robot Boxing league is in your hands – literally!  Maneuver your HP TouchPad to new heights of glory, gears and thrills as you sit in the driver’s seat of World Robot Boxing.  Use your HP TouchPad device to control your very own customized, fighting robot at WRB.com.  Can you triumph over the rigors of the planet’s most popular and brutal future-sport and emerge victorious?
 
The year is 2020. Human sparring is a thing of the past.  All that’s left is “Real Steel.”  Hugh Jackman stars in this new movie from DreamWorks, smashing its way into theaters October 7th, 2011.  The opening bout is already in progress at WRB.com and you’ve got a ringside seat.  So, what are you waiting for?  Download the app now and get your fight on!
